Html:
Hi, i created a definition file for the facebook sdk http://github.com/mientjan/typescript-facebook-definition/blob/master/facebook.d.ts. But i was wondering if there will be doc comment support in vs. this could be verry handy when dealing with unknown code.

So when writing

/**
 * Facebook SDK
 */
declare interface FB {
    /**
     * api - for calls to facebook
     */
    api(): void;
}

the comments give extra information about the property/method/class in the autocompletion of the IDE
Yes we requested this also, and it was moved to the Issue Tracker: http://typescript.codeplex.com/workitem/178 so please vote it up :)
